MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (int index, System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription);
.method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, class System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index at which to insert the `serviceDescription` parameter.
The to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified instance to the at the specified zero-based index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
If the `index` parameter is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, the `serviceDescription` parameter is added to the end of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection>.
The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.

Docs.exception:
The parameter is less than zero.
\- or -
The parameter is greater than <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.

public void Remove (System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription);
.method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription) cil managed

Docs.param: The to remove from the collection.
Docs.summary: Removes the first occurrence of the specified from the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
The elements that follow the removed <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> move up to occupy the vacated spot.
